#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;


int main()
{
    long long int t,a,b;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>a>>b;
        long long int c=0,d=0,ans,ans1=0;
        while(a>0)
        {
            c=c*10+a%10;
            a=a/10;
        }
        while(b>0)
        {
            d=d*10+b%10;
            b=b/10;
        }
        ans=c+d;
        while(ans>0)
        {
            ans1=ans1*10+ans%10;
            ans/=10;
        }
        cout<<ans1<<"\n";
    }
   return 0;
}
